# XmlUtilities.NodeIsWhitespaceText method

See if this node is just whitespace.

```csharp
public static bool NodeIsWhitespaceText(XNode node)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | A non-null XNode |

## Return Value

true if the node is an XText with a whitespace value.
